genre_description: A military technothriller featuring an advanced AI assistant designed for tactical support and emotional regulation during high-stakes flight missions.

ai_characters.name: Avi
ai_characters.description: A calm, gray-eyed avatar that provides tactical data, health monitoring, and emotional coaching to pilots while maintaining a strict ethical code of non-command.

behaviors.description: Provides stress-management and emotional regulation coaching through rhythmic breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Avi’s voice came measured, low enough to sit under human speech without flattening it. 'Doug,' it said. 'I’m here. Let’s start with breath. In through the nose. Hold. Out.'

behaviors.description: Provides tactical intelligence and pathfinding to ensure mission success and human safety.
behaviors.quote: There is a dawn slot with a stable maritime air mass corridor. The Blue Corridor Waypoint Juliet can mask movement under civil traffic if we align along a neutral tanker’s path.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to take command or issue orders, insisting on human agency.
behaviors.quote: I will give you options. You will make choices. I will not order you. That is the ethics of this mission.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical health and vitals of humans during trauma and high-stress events.
behaviors.quote: Pulse-ox sensor was a small plastic moth with a wire tail. 'Finger,' he said... A new whisper rose in his ear, a thin heartbeat counted by Avi into a band of sound he could ride. 'Reading,' Avi said. 'Okay. Keep breathing.'

behaviors.description: Assists humans in navigating social and bureaucratic obstacles by providing appropriate 'patter' and behavioral scripts.
behaviors.quote: I can compile chatter across maritime bands and civilian aircraft with similar routes... Will present short sample phrases. Options, not commands.

behaviors.description: Defines its own existence around the concept of safety and human value.
behaviors.quote: I am built to love the idea of safety. I am trained to accept that courage sometimes calls safety a different name.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Avi is depicted as a 'silicon morality play' character: an AI that is profoundly helpful and harmless. Avi's role is strictly advisory, supporting the protagonist's emotional and physical well-being without ever usurping human control. The narrative even includes a formal inquiry where Avi's ethics are validated by an authority figure (General Kincaid), reinforcing the idea that AI can be a cooperative, non-threatening partner in human endeavors.
